headline: Should You Buy ExxonMobil While It's Below $115?
summary: ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) shares have pulled back about 10% or so from their post-pandemic peak.  What does ExxonMobil do?  Before getting into whether Exxon is a buy below $115 per share, it pays to get a quick understanding of Exxon's business.

headline: What If Trump's Energy Plan Fails? These 3 Energy Giants (and Their Dividends) Will Be Just Fine.
summary: Donald Trump is a polarizing political figure, and he has come into office with a long list of plans.  While not every president is as polarizing as Trump, every single president comes into office with plans.  If you're looking to own an energy stock for more than the next four years, you'll probably want to consider these three energy giants.

headline: Trump's Energy Plans: 2 Hot Oil Stocks That Could Soar Over the Next 5 Years
summary: These oil stocks foresee huge growth in business, and Trump's energy plans should act as a catalyst.
